titles.title: He's my God He's my light

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's my God He's my light he is my salvation,
I will put my trust in Him,
I will not be ashamed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God of Glory, God of might, Hi is my strength, He is my sorrow
I will put my trust in Him,
I will not be ashamed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord,
Shout for joy all the Earth,
Let all people see His wonders.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord,
Shout for joy all the Earth,
Our God is a mighty God.
